roleset.name: light in color (perhaps unhealthily so), pallid, feeble

role.descr: specific aspect of arg1 that is pale

roles.note: Adjective's arg2 doesn't occur for syntactic reasons in the verb.

example.name: arg1
example.text: Even the cashier was a little pale.

example.name: both args
example.text: He was pale of face, ordinary in looks, neutral in opinions, thirty years of age, and a married man.

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1, fair.03.
